00023 {
00024         SystemModel=model;
00025         CurrentTitleFile=aCurrentTitleFile;
00026 
00027         PreviewtextBox->AutoSize=true;             //Set autosize of Preview window
00028 
00029         String^ temp=gcnew String("");
00030         String^ LongitudinalList=gcnew String(""); //Total LongitudinalList string
00031         int jj=0;
00032         
00033 
00034         //For updating, call this event handlers
00035         RelaxationComboBoxSelectedIndexChanged(FormalismcomboBox, gcnew System::EventArgs()); //"FormalismcomboBox" for example
00036     BasicSetComboBoxSelectedIndexChanged(BasisFormcomboBox, gcnew System::EventArgs()); 
00037         BasicSetextBoxKeyPress(MagnettextBox, gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13));
00038 
00039         //Loop over all atomsto create comboboxes for different datagridviews
00040         for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys) 
00041         {
00042                 String^ ID=Convert::ToString(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->ID);
00043         
00044                 //For recombination electrons
00045                 if(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element=="e")
00046                 {
00047                         Spin1comboBox->Items->Add(ID);
00048                         Spin2comboBox->Items->Add(ID);
00049                         temp=" E";
00050                 } 
00051                 else
00052                 {//For Longitudinal states
00053                 temp=" "+((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Mass+
00054                         ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element;
00055                 };
00056 
00057                 if(!LongitudinalList->Contains(temp)) 
00058                 {
00059                  Longitudinaldata->Rows->Add();
00060                  Longitudinaldata[1,jj]->Value=temp;
00061                  Longitudinaldata[0,jj]->Value=false;
00062                  LongitudinalList+=temp;
00063                  jj++;
00064                 };
00065         };
00066 
00067         //When there is electron, enable RecombinationTheoryBox in Chemical kinetics tab
00068         if(AtomCollection->get_electron_number() >1) 
00069         {
00070                 RecombinationTheoryBox->Enabled=true;
00071 
00072                 //Choose first
00073                 Spin1comboBox->Text=(String^)Spin1comboBox->Items[0];
00074                 Spin2comboBox->Items->RemoveAt(0);
00075                 Spin2comboBox->Text=(String^)Spin2comboBox->Items[0];
00076         };
00077 
00078         //For symmetry group
00079         SymmetryGroupdata->Rows->Add();
00080         DataGridViewComboBoxCell^ Symmetrycombobox=gcnew DataGridViewComboBoxCell();
00081         Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add(" ");
00082         Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S2"); Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S3");
00083         Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S4");Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S4A");
00084         Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S5");Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S6");
00085         SymmetryGroupdata[0,0]=Symmetrycombobox;
00086         SymmetryGroupdata[0,0]->Value=" ";
00087                 
00088         //Update Longitudinal states
00089         LongitudinaldataRefresh();
00090 
00091         //Call handlers for updating
00092         ChemicalKineticstextBoxKeyPress(SinglettextBox,gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13)); //"Liouvilliantext" for example
00093         ChemicalKineticsComboBoxSelectedIndexChanged(RadicalPaircomboBox, gcnew System::EventArgs()); 
00094         RelaxationtextBoxKeyPress(DampRatetext, gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13)); //"DampRatetex" for example

00098 
00099         //Update  the final strings
00100         WriteHeader();
00101         WriteFooter();

00119         header="%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% \r\n";

00131 
00132 
00133         //Atoms etc///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00134         //Create Atoms and label matrices
00135         for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys) 
00136         {
00137                 if(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element=="e") 
00138                         temp=(i==1? (String ^ )"" : (String ^ )", ")+"\'E\'";

00140                 {

00142                                 "\'"+((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Mass+
00143                                 ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element+"\'";
00144                 };
00145                 AtomList+=temp;
00146 
00147                 //Similarly for writing SpinachGUI Indexes
00148                 temp2 = gcnew String(" ",0, temp->Length);
00149                 temp2=temp2->Insert(1, Convert::ToString(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->ID));
00150                 SpinachGUIIndex+=temp2->Remove(temp->Length); //Reduced it to original size
00151 
00152                 //If label is not empty or zero size
00153                 AtomLabels+=(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Label!=nullptr && 
00154                                  ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Label!=" " &&
00155                                          ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Label->Length!=0?
00156                         "sys.labels{"+((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->ID+"}= '"+
00157                 ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Label+(String ^ )"';\r\n" 
00158                 :       (String ^ )""); 
00159         };
00160 
00161         //Print Atoms and Labels
00162         FileText+="% Isotopes \r\n";
00163         FileText+="sys.isotopes={"+ AtomList+ "};  \r\n";
00164         FileText+="\r\n";
00165 
00166         //When a label is present , print it
00167         if(AtomLabels->Length>0)
00168         FileText+="% Lables \r\n";
00169         FileText+= AtomLabels;
00170         FileText+="\r\n";

00180 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::WriteFooter()
00181 {
00182         int A,B;
00183         String ^ FileText=gcnew String("");
00184         String ^coord, ^temp;
00185         double trace=0.0f;
00186         array<array<String^>^>^ CouplingMatrix=gcnew array<array<String^>^>(AtomCollection->Count);
00187         array<String^>^ ZeemanMatrix=gcnew array<String^>(AtomCollection->Count);
00188         //Coordinates etc////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00189 
00190         FileText+="% Coordinates \r\n";
00191         coord= gcnew String("inter.coordinates={");
00192         FileText+=coord;
00193         temp = gcnew String("                   "); //For aligning to the first line
00194         for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys)  
00195         {
00196                 if(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element!="e")
00197                         FileText+= (i==1? (String ^ )"[" : (String ^ )";\r\n"+temp+"[")+
00198                         ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->X+" "+
00199                         ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Y+" "+
00200                         ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->Z+"]";
00201                 else FileText+=(i==1? (String ^ )"[" : (String ^ )";\r\n"+temp+"[ ")+"]";
00202 
00203         };
00204 
00205         FileText+= "};  \r\n";
00206         FileText+="\r\n";
00207         FileText+="\r\n";
00208         FileText+="\r\n";
00209 
00210         //Couplings etc///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00211         //Initiate coupling and zeeman matrix
00212         for (int i=0;i<AtomCollection->Count-1;i++) 
00213         {
00214                 CouplingMatrix[i]=gcnew array<String^>(AtomCollection->Count);
00215                 ZeemanMatrix[i]="[0 0 0; 0 0 0; 0 0 0]";
00216                 for(int j=0;j<AtomCollection->Count-1;j++)
00217                 {
00218                         CouplingMatrix[i][j]="[0 0 0; 0 0 0; 0 0 0]";
00219                 };
00220         };      
00221 
00222         FileText+=" \r\n";
00223 
00224         //Write emtrpy matrix for atoms
00225         FileText+="% Coupling Matrices\r\n";
00226         FileText+="inter.coupling.matrix=cell("+AtomCollection->Count+");  \r\n";
00227 
00228         //Create coupling and zeeman matrix
00229         for each(int i in InteractionCollection->Keys) 
00230         {
00231                 String ^ astring=gcnew String("");
00232 
00233                 if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::HFC)
00234                         astring="1e6*gauss2mhz([";
00235                 else if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar)
00236                 {
00237 			::Matrix3x3^ matrix3x3=TransformToLab(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i]));
00238                         astring="1e6*[";
00239                         //For trace equal to zero after rounding
00240                         trace=Math::Round((Math::Round(1000.0f*matrix3x3[0])+
00241                                 Math::Round(1000.0f*matrix3x3[4])+
00242                                 Math::Round(1000.0f*matrix3x3[8]))/3.0f)/1000.0f;
00243                 }
00244                 else astring="[";
00245 
00246 
00247                 //Write chemical bonds minus trace
00248                 if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind!=InteractionKind::CBond)
00249                 {
00250 			::Matrix3x3^ matrix3x3=TransformToLab(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i]));
00251                         astring+=
00252                                 To_String(Math::Round(matrix3x3[0]*1000.0f)/1000.0f-trace)+" "+
00253                                 To_String(matrix3x3[1])+" "+
00254                                 To_String(matrix3x3[2])+"; "+
00255                                 To_String(matrix3x3[3])+" "+
00256                                 To_String(Math::Round(matrix3x3[4]*1000.0f)/1000.0f-trace)+" "+
00257                                 To_String(matrix3x3[5])+"; "+
00258                                 To_String(matrix3x3[6])+" "+
00259                                 To_String(matrix3x3[7])+" "+
00260                                 To_String(Math::Round(matrix3x3[8]*1000.0f)/1000.0f-trace)+"]";
00261                 }
00262                 if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::HFC)
00263                         astring+=")";
00264 
00265                 //Write HFC. Gtensor, Exchange, quadropolar and Zero-Splitting
00266                 if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::HFC ||
00267                         ((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Exchange ||
00268                         ((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar ||
00269                         ((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::ZFS)
00270                 {
00271                         A=((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID;
00272                         if(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i])->B!=nullptr) B=((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i])->B->ID;
00273                         else B=A;
00274                         FileText+="inter.coupling.matrix{"+A+", "+B+"}="+astring+"; \r\n"; //one-base indexing
00275 
00276                 };
00277         };
00278 
00279         //Write empty Scalar Couplings matrix 
00280         FileText+=" \r\n";
00281         FileText+="% Scalar Couplings\r\n";
00282         FileText+="inter.coupling.scalar=cell("+AtomCollection->Count+");  \r\n";
00283 
00284         //Create coupling and zeeman matrix
00285         for each(int i in InteractionCollection->Keys)
00286         {
00287                 String ^ astring=gcnew String("");
00288 
00289                 if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling)
00290                 {
00291                         astring=To_String(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i])->matrix3x3[0]);
00292                         A=((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID;
00293                         if(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i])->B!=nullptr) B=((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i])->B->ID;
00294                         else B=A;
00295                         FileText+="inter.coupling.scalar{"+A+", "+B+"}="+astring+"; \r\n"; //one-base indexing
00296 
00297                 };
00298         };
00299 
00300 
00301         //Write empty Zeeman matrix 
00302         FileText+=" \r\n";
00303         FileText+="% Zeeman Interactions \r\n";
00304         FileText+="inter.zeeman.matrix=cell(1, "+AtomCollection->Count+");  \r\n";
00305         System::Collections::Generic::SortedList<int, String^> ^ Zeeman=
00306                 gcnew System::Collections::Generic::SortedList<int, String^>();
00307 
00308         //Loop over all interactions for getnsors and shifts
00309         for each(int i in InteractionCollection->Keys)
00310         {       
00311                 String ^ astring=gcnew String("");
00312 		::Matrix3x3^ matrix3x3=TransformToLab(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i]));
00313                 astring="[";
00314 
00315                 if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::GTensor)
00316                         astring+=
00317                         To_StringG(matrix3x3[0])+" "+
00318                         To_StringG(matrix3x3[1])+" "+

00409 /**
00410 * @brief EventHandler for opening the save dialoguebox and  writing the stream to file.
00411 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00412 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00413 */
00414 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::Exportbutton_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
00415 {       
00416         //Setting the format and initila filename for the save dialoguebox 
00417         saveFileDialog->Filter="Spinach File|*.m";
00418         saveFileDialog->FileName=Path::GetFileNameWithoutExtension(CurrentTitleFile)+".m";
00419 
00420         //Opens the save dialogue box and check if the OK button clicked then save to file
00421         if (saveFileDialog->ShowDialog() == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::OK )
00422         {        
00423                 FileStream^ fs=gcnew FileStream(saveFileDialog->FileName,FileMode::Create );
00424 
00425                 //SWrites a nice header withe the filename
00426                 header="%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% \r\n";
00427                 header+="% This Matlab file is generated by Spinach GUI "+SpinachGUIver+" \r\n";
00428                 header+="%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% \r\n";
00429                 header+="\r\n";
00430                 header+="function "+Path::GetFileNameWithoutExtension(saveFileDialog->FileName)+"() \r\n";
00431                 header+="\r\n";
00432 
00433                 //Add this header to the final string
00434                 final=header+final;
00435 
00436                 //Convert and write to the file
00437                 array<Byte>^ info = (gcnew UTF8Encoding( true ))->GetBytes(final);
00438                 fs->Write( info, 0, info->Length  );
00439                 fs->Close();
00440         };
00441 }

00472 /**
00473 * @brief Function for refreshing Londitudinal  states string
00474 * from Londitudinal states datagridview in General tab
00475 */
00476 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::LongitudinaldataRefresh()
00477 {
00478         String ^ temp= gcnew String("");
00479         longitudinals="";
00480 
00481         //Loop over all cells in Londitudinal states datagridview
00482         for(int i=0;i<Longitudinaldata->Rows->Count;i++) 
00483         { 
00484                 //if the first column cell is checked, write the data of the second column cell in the appropriate format
00485                 if(Convert::ToInt32(Longitudinaldata[0,i]->Value)) temp+=" '"+Longitudinaldata[1,i]->Value+"',";
00486         };
00487 
00488         //If there are data in the cells, write the Londitudinal states string
00489         if(temp->Length>0)      longitudinals="bas.longitudinals={"+temp->TrimEnd(',')+"};\r\n";
00490 
00491         //Update  the final strings
00492         WriteHeader();
00493         WriteFooter();
00494 }

00497 /**
00498 * @brief EventHandler for when something selected from comboboxes in the Formalism, 
00499 * Approximation and coupling graph construction in General tab.
00500 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00501 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00502 */
00503 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::BasicSetComboBoxSelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
00504 {
00505         //Formalism,  write the appropriate string and enable Approximation and coupling graph construction comboboxes
00506         basicsetstring="bas.formalism=";
00507         if(BasisFormcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Spherical tensor basis, Liouville space, sparse matrices (sphten-liouv)") 
00508         {basicsetstring+="'sphten-liouv'"+";\r\n";ApproximationcomboBox->Enabled=true;GraphcomboBox->Enabled=true;}
00509         else if(BasisFormcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Zeeman basis, Hilbert space, sparse matrices (zeeman-hilb)") 
00510         {basicsetstring+="'zeeman-hilb'"+";\r\n";ApproximationcomboBox->Enabled=false;GraphcomboBox->Enabled=false;}
00511         else if(BasisFormcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Zeeman basis, Liouville space, sparse matrices (zeeman-liouv)") 
00512         {basicsetstring+="'zeeman-liouv'"+";\r\n";ApproximationcomboBox->Enabled=false;GraphcomboBox->Enabled=false;}
00513 
00514         //When Approximation combobox enabled,  write the appropriate string and enable 
00515         //Maximum global and local correlation order textboxes
00516         if(ApproximationcomboBox->Enabled)
00517         {
00518                 basicsetstring+="bas.approximation=";
00519                 if(ApproximationcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Formally exact calculation") 
00520                 {
00521                         basicsetstring+="'none'"+";\r\n";
00522                         CoherencetextBox->Enabled=false;
00523                         MaxCouplingLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00524                         MaxProximityLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00525                 }
00526                 else if(ApproximationcomboBox->SelectedItem=="IK-0: all spin correlations up to the given order") 
00527                 {
00528                         basicsetstring+="'IK-0'"+";\r\n";
00529                         CoherencetextBox->Enabled=true;
00530                         MaxCouplingLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00531                         MaxProximityLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00532                 }
00533                 else if(ApproximationcomboBox->SelectedItem=="IK-1: spin correlations up to the given order between directly coupled spins") 
00534                 {
00535                         basicsetstring+="'IK-1'"+";\r\n";
00536                         CoherencetextBox->Enabled=false;
00537                         MaxCouplingLeveltextBox->Enabled=true;
00538                         MaxProximityLeveltextBox->Enabled=true;
00539                 }
00540                 else if(ApproximationcomboBox->SelectedItem=="IK-2: correlations with all nearest coupling neighbors for each spin") 
00541                 {
00542                         basicsetstring+="'IK-2'"+";\r\n";
00543                         CoherencetextBox->Enabled=false;
00544                         MaxCouplingLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00545                         MaxProximityLeveltextBox->Enabled=true;
00546                 }
00547                 else if(ApproximationcomboBox->SelectedItem=="ESR-1: complete basis on electrons, zero-quantum basis on nuclei") 
00548                 {
00549                         basicsetstring+="'ESR-1'"+";\r\n";
00550                         CoherencetextBox->Enabled=false;
00551                         MaxCouplingLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00552                         MaxProximityLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00553                 }
00554                 else if(ApproximationcomboBox->SelectedItem=="ESR-2: complete basis on e and n with anisotropic HFCs, ZQ basis otherwise ") 
00555                 {
00556                         basicsetstring+="'ESR-2'"+";\r\n";
00557                         CoherencetextBox->Enabled=false;
00558                         MaxCouplingLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00559                         MaxProximityLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00560                 }
00561         }// If Approximation combobox disabled, disable Maximum global and local correlation order textboxes
00562         else
00563         {
00564                 CoherencetextBox->Enabled=false;
00565                 MaxCouplingLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00566                 MaxProximityLeveltextBox->Enabled=false;
00567         }
00568 
00569         //When Coupling graph construction combobox enabled,  write the appropriate string
00570         if(GraphcomboBox->Enabled)
00571         {
00572                 basicsetstring+="bas.connectivity=";
00573                 if(GraphcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Using scalar couplings only") 
00574                         basicsetstring+="'scalar_couplings'"+";\r\n";
00575                 else if(GraphcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Using full coupling tensors") 
00576                         basicsetstring+="'full_tensors'"+";\r\n";
00577         }
00578 
00579         //Call keypress handler with enter, to update the values from textfields
00580         BasicSetextBoxKeyPress(MagnettextBox, gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13));
00581 
00582         //Update  the final strings
00583         WriteHeader();
00584         WriteFooter();
00585 }
00586 
00587 /**
00588 * @brief EventHandler for pressing key in cells in the 
00589 * in General tab.
00590 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00591 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00592 */
00593 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::BasicSetextBoxKeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00594 {
00595         basicsetnumstring="";
00596         internumstring="";
00597 
00598         //If key pressed is not number, or . or backspace, or E or enter do nothing
00599         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != 'e' && 
00600                 e->KeyChar != 'E' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00601         {
00602                 e->Handled = true;
00603         }
00604         else
00605         {
00606                 //When enter is hitted
00607                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
00608                 {
00609                         double result;
00610 
00611                         //Try to parse the number
00612                         if(Double::TryParse(((TextBox^)sender)->Text, result))
00613                         {
00614                                 //Returned to original color of the textbox
00615                                 ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00616 
00617                                 //Write the magnetic field, proximityy cut-off and temperature in the appropriate format in the string
00618                                 magnetstring="sys.magnet="+ MagnettextBox->Text+";\r\n";
00619                                 cutoffstring="sys.tols.prox_cutoff="+ ProximitytextBox->Text+";\r\n";
00620                                 internumstring+="inter.temperature="+ TemperaturetextBox->Text+";\r\n";
00621 
00622                                 //When enabled, write Maximum global correlation order, coupling and priximity graph 
00623                                 //in the appropriate format in the string
00624                                 if(CoherencetextBox->Enabled) basicsetnumstring+="bas.level="+ CoherencetextBox->Text+";\r\n";
00625                                 if(MaxCouplingLeveltextBox->Enabled) basicsetnumstring+="bas.level="+ MaxCouplingLeveltextBox->Text+";\r\n";
00626                                 if(MaxProximityLeveltextBox->Enabled) basicsetnumstring+="bas.space_level="+ MaxProximityLeveltextBox->Text+";\r\n";
00627 
00628                                 //Set the diagonal elements in the Liquid crystall order matrix
00629                                 Mat21textBox->Text=Mat12textBox->Text; 
00630                                 Mat31textBox->Text=Mat13textBox->Text; 
00631                                 Mat32textBox->Text=Mat23textBox->Text;
00632 
00633                                 //If the Liquid crystall order matrix has no zero element, write in the appropriate format in the string
00634                                 if(!(Mat11textBox->Text=="0.000" && Mat12textBox->Text=="0.000" && Mat13textBox->Text=="0.000" &&
00635                                         Mat21textBox->Text=="0.000" && Mat22textBox->Text=="0.000" && Mat23textBox->Text=="0.000" &&
00636                                         Mat31textBox->Text=="0.000" && Mat32textBox->Text=="0.000" && Mat33textBox->Text=="0.000"))
00637                                         internumstring+="inter.order_matrix=["+
00638                                         Mat11textBox->Text+" "+Mat12textBox->Text+" "+Mat13textBox->Text+" ;"+
00639                                         Mat21textBox->Text+" "+Mat22textBox->Text+" "+Mat23textBox->Text+" ;"+
00640                                         Mat31textBox->Text+" "+Mat32textBox->Text+" "+ Mat33textBox->Text+"];\r\n";
00641 
00642                                 //Update  the final strings
00643                                 WriteHeader();
00644                                 WriteFooter();
00645                         }//else do nothing if not a valid number
00646                         else e->Handled = true;
00647 
00648                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00649                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00650         };
00651 }

00653 /**
00654 * @brief EventHandler for when finishing editing all cells in Symmetry 
00655 * factorization datagridview in General tab.
00656 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00657 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00658 */
00659 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::SymmetryGroupdata_CellEndEdit(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^  e) 
00660 {
00661         int result;
00662         DataGridViewComboBoxCell^ Symmetrycombobox=gcnew DataGridViewComboBoxCell();
00663 
00664         //For  when cell is in the first column and 
00665         //is not empty and when the current cell is the last one
00666         if(e->ColumnIndex==0 && SymmetryGroupdata[0,e->RowIndex]->Value!=" " && 
00667                 SymmetryGroupdata->Rows->Count-1==e->RowIndex)
00668         {
00669                 //Add a new row
00670                 SymmetryGroupdata->Rows->Add();
00671 
00672                 //Add items in the combobox
00673                 Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add(" ");
00674                 Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S2"); Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S3");
00675                 Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S4");Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S4A");
00676                 Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S5");Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add("S6");
00677 
00678                 //Set combobox to cell
00679                 SymmetryGroupdata[0,e->RowIndex+1]=Symmetrycombobox;
00680                 SymmetryGroupdata[0,e->RowIndex+1]->Value=" ";
00681 
00682                 //When last column, add an extra column with that width
00683                 if(SymmetryGroupdata->Columns->Count<(e->ColumnIndex+2))
00684                 {
00685                         SymmetryGroupdata->Columns->Add("1","Atom 1 ID");
00686                         SymmetryGroupdata->Columns[1]->Width=55;
00687                 };
00688 
00689                 Symmetrycombobox=gcnew DataGridViewComboBoxCell();
00690 
00691                 //Add all atom IDs to the new combobox
00692                 Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add(" ");
00693                 for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys) 
00694                         Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add(Convert::ToString(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->ID)); 
00695 
00696                 //Set combobox to cell and initialize it
00697                 String ^temp=(String ^)SymmetryGroupdata[1,e->RowIndex]->Value;
00698                 SymmetryGroupdata[1,e->RowIndex]=Symmetrycombobox;
00699                 SymmetryGroupdata[1,e->RowIndex]->Value=temp;
00700 
00701         };
00702 
00703 
00704         //For  when cell is in columns other than the first and 
00705         //is not empty
00706         if(e->ColumnIndex>0 && SymmetryGroupdata[e->ColumnIndex,e->RowIndex]->Value!=" ")
00707         {
00708                 //When last column, add an extra column with that width
00709                 if(SymmetryGroupdata->Columns->Count<(e->ColumnIndex+2))
00710                 {
00711                         SymmetryGroupdata->Columns->Add(Convert::ToString(e->ColumnIndex+1),"Atom "+(e->ColumnIndex+1)+" ID");
00712                         SymmetryGroupdata->Columns[e->ColumnIndex+1]->Width=55;
00713                 };
00714 
00715 
00716                 Symmetrycombobox=gcnew DataGridViewComboBoxCell();
00717 
00718                 //Add all atom IDs to the new combobox
00719                 Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add(" ");
00720                 for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys) 
00721                         Symmetrycombobox->Items->Add(Convert::ToString(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->ID)); 
00722 
00723                 //Set combobox to the next column's cell and initialize it
00724                 String ^tempt=(String ^)SymmetryGroupdata[e->ColumnIndex+1,e->RowIndex]->Value;
00725                 SymmetryGroupdata[e->ColumnIndex+1,e->RowIndex]=Symmetrycombobox;
00726                 SymmetryGroupdata[e->ColumnIndex+1,e->RowIndex]->Value=tempt;
00727         };
00728 
00729         String ^ group=gcnew String("");
00730         String ^ atoms=gcnew String("");
00731 
00732         //when more than two columns
00733         if(SymmetryGroupdata->Columns->Count>2)
00734         {
00735                 symmetry="bas.sym_group={";
00736 
00737                 //Loop over first column cells and write in appropriate format into the string
00738                 for(int i=0;i<SymmetryGroupdata->Rows->Count-1;i++) 
00739                 {
00740                         //Write when cell is not empty and in correct numerical format
00741                         if(((String ^)SymmetryGroupdata[0,i]->Value)->Length>1 && 
00742                                 Int32::TryParse(((String ^)SymmetryGroupdata[1,i]->Value), result))
00743                                 symmetry+=" '"+SymmetryGroupdata[0,i]->Value+"',";
00744                 }
00745 
00746                 //Write end of previous string and begin of the next string
00747                 symmetry=symmetry->TrimEnd(',')+"};\r\n";
00748                 symmetry+="bas.sym_spins={";
00749 
00750                 //Loop over lines and write in appropriate format into the string
00751                 for(int i=0;i<SymmetryGroupdata->Rows->Count-1;i++) 
00752                 {
00753                         //Write when cell is not empty and in correct numerical format
00754                         if(((String ^)SymmetryGroupdata[0,i]->Value)->Length>1 && 
00755                                 Int32::TryParse(((String ^)SymmetryGroupdata[1,i]->Value), result))
00756                         {
00757                                 symmetry+="[";
00758 
00759                                 //Loop over the cells in the specific line
00760                                 for(int j=1;j<SymmetryGroupdata->Columns->Count-1;j++) 
00761                                 {
00762                                         //Write when cell is correct numerical format
00763                                         if(Int32::TryParse(((String ^)SymmetryGroupdata[j,i]->Value), result)) 
00764                                         {
00765                                                 symmetry+=" "+(Convert::ToInt32(SymmetryGroupdata[j,i]->Value));
00766                                         }
00767                                 } //one-base indexing
00768                                 symmetry+=" ],";
00769                         }
00770                 };
00771 
00772                 //Finish string
00773                 symmetry=symmetry->TrimEnd(',')+" };\r\n";
00774         }
00775 
00776         //Update  the final strings
00777         WriteHeader();
00778         WriteFooter();
00779 }

00787 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::SymmetryGroupdata_CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e)

00793 /**
00794 * @brief EventHandler for when mouse enters in a cell(for only one click for begin editing)
00795 *  in Symmetry factorization datagridview in General tab
00796 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00797 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00798 */
00799 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::SymmetryGroupdata_CellMouseEnter(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^  e) 
00800 {
00801         //For all cells, in cell that is not current
00802         //and when only one cell is selected. Set current cell the one below mouse(entered)
00803         if( e->ColumnIndex>=0 && e->RowIndex>=0 && !SymmetryGroupdata->IsCurrentCellInEditMode 
00804                 && SymmetryGroupdata->SelectedRows->Count<1 )
00805                 SymmetryGroupdata->CurrentCell = SymmetryGroupdata[e->ColumnIndex,e->RowIndex];
00806 }

00812 /**
00813 * @brief EventHandler for when something selected from comboboxes in the chemical exchange type, 
00814 * Radical pair kinetics and recombination electrons  in Exchange Rates matrix datagridview in Chemical kinetics tab
00815 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00816 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00817 */
00818 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::ChemicalKineticsComboBoxSelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
00819 {
00820         //Chemical exchange type,  write the appropriate string and enable the exchange rate table
00821         chemicalkineticsstring="";
00822         if(ChemKineticscomboBox->SelectedItem=="No chemical exchange") {ExchangeRatetable->Enabled=false;}
00823         else if(ChemKineticscomboBox->SelectedItem=="Intermolecular exchange") 
00824         {chemicalkineticsstring+="inter.chem.type='intermolecular'"+";\r\n";ExchangeRatetable->Enabled=true;}
00825         else if(ChemKineticscomboBox->SelectedItem=="Interamolecular exchange") 
00826         {chemicalkineticsstring+="inter.chem.type='intramolecular'"+";\r\n";ExchangeRatetable->Enabled=true;}
00827 
00828         //Radical pair kinetics,  write the appropriate string, when activated
00829         if(RecombinationTheoryBox->Enabled)
00830         {
00831                 chemicalkineticsstring+="inter.chem.rp_theory=";
00832                 if(RadicalPaircomboBox->SelectedItem=="No radical reactions") chemicalkineticsstring+="'off'"+";\r\n";
00833                 else if(RadicalPaircomboBox->SelectedItem=="Exponential model") chemicalkineticsstring+="'exponential'"+";\r\n";
00834                 else if(RadicalPaircomboBox->SelectedItem=="Haberkorn model")   chemicalkineticsstring+="'haberkorn'"+";\r\n";
00835                 else if(RadicalPaircomboBox->SelectedItem=="Jones-Hore model") chemicalkineticsstring+="'jones-hore'"+";\r\n";
00836         };
00837 
00838 
00839         //For recombination electrons, for when electron 1 changes and when activated
00840         if(RecombinationTheoryBox->Enabled && sender==Spin1comboBox)
00841         {
00842                 //Clear the combo box of electron 2
00843                 Spin2comboBox->Items->Clear();
00844 
00845                 //Loop overall ID in electron 1 combo box
00846                 for(int i=0;i<Spin1comboBox->Items->Count;i++)
00847                 {
00848                         //Add everything to electron 2 combobox except the one selected
00849                         if(Convert::ToInt32(Spin1comboBox->Items[i])!=Convert::ToInt32(Spin1comboBox->Text)) 
00850                                 Spin2comboBox->Items->Add((String ^) Spin1comboBox->Items[i]);
00851                 };
00852 
00853                 //Set combobox to the first item
00854                 Spin2comboBox->Text=(String^)Spin2comboBox->Items[0];
00855 
00856                 //Write recombination electrond in the appropriate format in the string
00857                 chemicalkineticsstring+="inter.chem.rp_spins=["+
00858                         (Convert::ToInt32(Spin1comboBox->SelectedItem))+" "+
00859                         (Convert::ToInt32(Spin2comboBox->SelectedItem))+"] ;\r\n"; //one-base indexing
00860         };
00861 
00862         //Update the rest text field hitting enter
00863         ChemicalKineticstextBoxKeyPress(SinglettextBox,gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13)); //"Liouvilliantext" for example
00864 
00865         //Update  the final strings
00866         WriteHeader();
00867         WriteFooter();
00868 }

00871 * @brief EventHandler for pressing key in cells in the 
00872 * third column in Exchange Rates matrix datagridview in Chemical kinetics tab

00875 */
00876 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::ChemicalKineticstextBoxKeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00877 {
00878         chemicalkineticsnumstring="";
00879 
00880         //If key pressed is not number, or . or backspace, or E or enter do nothing
00881         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != 'e' && 
00882                 e->KeyChar != 'E' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00883         {
00884                 e->Handled = true;
00885         }
00886         else
00887         {
00888                 //When enter is hitted
00889                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
00890                 {
00891                         double result;
00892 
00893                         //Try to parse the number
00894                         if(Double::TryParse(((TextBox^)sender)->Text, result))
00895                         {
00896                                 //Returned to original color of the textbox
00897                                 ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00898 
00899                                 //Write the rates in the appropriate format in the string
00900                                 if(RecombinationTheoryBox->Enabled )
00901                                         chemicalkineticsnumstring+="inter.chem.rp_rates=["+ SinglettextBox->Text+" "+TriplettextBox->Text+ "] ;\r\n";
00902 
00903                                 //Update  the final strings
00904                                 WriteHeader();
00905                                 WriteFooter();
00906                         }//else do nothing if not a valid number
00907                         else e->Handled = true;
00908 
00909                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00910                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00911         };
00912 }

00941 /**
00942 * @brief EventHandler for setting up the keypress handler to a cell in the 
00943 * third column in Exchange Rates matrix datagridview in Chemical kinetics tab
00944 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00945 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00946 */
00947 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::ChemicalKinetics_EditingControlShowing(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs^  e) 
00948 {

00951         {
00952                 //Setup the text for selected cell and set the keypress event handler 
00953                 TextBox^ txtbox = (TextBox^)(e->Control);
00954                 if (txtbox != nullptr) txtbox->KeyPress += gcnew KeyPressEventHandler(this,&Spinach::ChemicalKineticstextBoxKeyPress);
00955         };

00959 /**
00960 * @brief EventHandler for when finishing editing the first or second or third column's cell in the 
00961 * in Exchange Rates matrix datagridview in Chemical kinetics tab
00962 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00963 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00964 */
00965 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::ExchangeRateMatrix_CellEndEdit(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^  e) 
00966 {
00967         int result;
00968 
00969         //For when there is no lines yet or of when the first, second and the third column's current cells
00970         //are not empty and when the current cell is the last one
00971         if(e->RowIndex==-1 || 
00972                 (ExchangeRateMatrix[0,e->RowIndex]->Value!=" " &&
00973                 ExchangeRateMatrix[1,e->RowIndex]->Value!=" " &&
00974                 ExchangeRateMatrix[2,e->RowIndex]->Value!="0.00" &&
00975                 ExchangeRateMatrix->Rows->Count<e->RowIndex+2))
00976         {
00977                 //Add a row
00978                 ExchangeRateMatrix->Rows->Add();
00979 
00980                 //Create  two combo boxes with an empty item
00981                 DataGridViewComboBoxCell^ Exchangecombobox1=gcnew DataGridViewComboBoxCell();
00982                 DataGridViewComboBoxCell^ Exchangecombobox2=gcnew DataGridViewComboBoxCell();
00983                 Exchangecombobox1->Items->Add(" ");
00984                 Exchangecombobox2->Items->Add(" ");
00985 
00986                 //Loop over all atoms in order to add them in the combobox
00987                 for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys)  
00988                 {
00989                         //Add Atom IDs in the combobox
00990                         String^ ID=Convert::ToString(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->ID);
00991 
00992                         Exchangecombobox1->Items->Add(ID);
00993                         Exchangecombobox2->Items->Add(ID);
00994                 }
00995 
00996                 //Set the comboboxes to the first cell
00997                 ExchangeRateMatrix[0,e->RowIndex+1]=Exchangecombobox1;
00998                 ExchangeRateMatrix[1,e->RowIndex+1]=Exchangecombobox2;
00999 
01000                 //Set the value of the first and second cell combobox empty and to the third zero
01001                 ExchangeRateMatrix[0,e->RowIndex+1]->Value=" ";
01002                 ExchangeRateMatrix[1,e->RowIndex+1]->Value=" ";
01003                 ExchangeRateMatrix[2,e->RowIndex+1]->Value="0.00";
01004 
01005         };
01006 
01007         //So when exchange rate matrix enabled
01008         if(ExchangeRatetable->Enabled)
01009         {
01010                 //Set Exchange rate matrix to zero
01011                 exchangestring="inter.chem.exchange=zeros("+AtomCollection->Count+");\r\n";
01012 
01013                 //Loop over all Exchange rate matrix to write the data in the string
01014                 for(int i=0;i<ExchangeRateMatrix->Rows->Count;i++) 
01015                 {
01016                         //Check if the first and second column is a valid integer number and third different than zero
01017                         if( Int32::TryParse(((String ^)ExchangeRateMatrix[0,i]->Value), result) &&
01018                                 Int32::TryParse(((String ^)ExchangeRateMatrix[1,i]->Value), result) &&
01019                                 ExchangeRateMatrix[2,i]->Value!="0.00")
01020                                 exchangestring+="inter.chem.exchange("+    //Write Exchange rate values in appropriate format into the string
01021                                 (Convert::ToInt32(ExchangeRateMatrix[0,i]->Value))+ ", " +  //one-base indexing
01022                                 (Convert::ToInt32(ExchangeRateMatrix[1,i]->Value))+ ")=" + //one-base indexing
01023                                 ExchangeRateMatrix[2,i]->Value+ ";\r\n";
01024                 };
01025         };
01026 
01027         //Update  the final strings
01028         WriteHeader();
01029         WriteFooter();
01030 };
01031

01033 /**
01034 * @brief EventHandler for when an item is selected in a dropbox in a cell  in the 
01035 * first and second column in Exchange Rates matrix datagridview in Chemical kinetics tab
01036 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01037 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01038 */
01039 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::ExchangeRateMatrix_CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e)
01040 {
01041         //For only first and second column in relaxations rates R table,
01042         //call EndEdit handler
01043         if(ExchangeRateMatrix->CurrentCellAddress.X==0 || ExchangeRateMatrix->CurrentCellAddress.X==1)  
01044                 ExchangeRateMatrix->EndEdit(DataGridViewDataErrorContexts::Commit);
01045 }

01051 /**
01052 * @brief EventHandler for combo box of Formalism in Relaxation theory tab
01053 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01054 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01055 */
01056 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::RelaxationComboBoxSelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
01057 {
01058         //Initialize the string
01059         relaxationtheorystring="inter.relaxation=";
01060 
01061         //Selected option-string
01062         if(FormalismcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Unitary dynamics (default)") 
01063         {
01064                 //Set the Spinach parameter
01065                 relaxationtheorystring+="'none'"+";\r\n";
01066 
01067                 //Activate/deactivate the appropriate controls
01068                 DampgroupBox->Visible=false; 
01069                 Relaxation1table->Visible=false; 
01070                 Relaxation2table->Visible=false;

01073                 RelaxationgroupBox->Visible=false;
01074         }
01075         else if(FormalismcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Non-selective damping")
01076         {
01077                 //Set the Spinach parameter
01078                 relaxationtheorystring+="'damp'"+";\r\n";
01079 
01080                 //Activate/deactivate the appropriate controls
01081                 DampgroupBox->Visible=true; 
01082                 Relaxation1table->Visible=false;
01083                 Relaxation2table->Visible=false; 
01084                 R1R2groupBox->Visible=false;

01087         }
01088         else if(FormalismcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Extended T1,T2 approximation") 
01089         {
01090                 //Set the Spinach parameter
01091                 relaxationtheorystring+="'t1_t2'"+";\r\n";
01092 
01093                 //Activate/deactivate the appropriate controls
01094                 DampgroupBox->Visible=false; 
01095                 Relaxation1table->Visible=true;
01096                 Relaxation2table->Visible=true; 
01097                 R1R2groupBox->Visible=false;
01098                 RotationalgroupBox->Visible=false;
01099                 RelaxationgroupBox->Visible=true;
01100         }
01101         else if(FormalismcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Redfield theory (analytical)") 
01102         {
01103                 //Set the Spinach parameter
01104                 relaxationtheorystring+="'redfield'"+";\r\n";
01105 
01106                 //Activate/deactivate the appropriate controls
01107                 DampgroupBox->Visible=false; 
01108                 Relaxation1table->Visible=false;
01109                 Relaxation2table->Visible=false; 
01110                 R1R2groupBox->Visible=false;
01111                 RotationalgroupBox->Visible=true;
01112                 RelaxationgroupBox->Visible=true;
01113         }
01114         else if(FormalismcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Redfield theory (brute force)") 
01115         {
01116                 //Set the Spinach parameter
01117                 relaxationtheorystring+="'bfgcez'"+";\r\n";
01118 
01119                 //Activate/deactivate the appropriate controls
01120                 DampgroupBox->Visible=false; 
01121                 Relaxation1table->Visible=false;
01122                 Relaxation2table->Visible=false; 
01123                 R1R2groupBox->Visible=false;
01124                 RotationalgroupBox->Visible=true;
01125                 RelaxationgroupBox->Visible=true;
01126         }
01127         else if(FormalismcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Lindblad theory") 
01128         {
01129                 //Set the Spinach parameter
01130                 relaxationtheorystring+="'lindblad'"+";\r\n";
01131 
01132                 //Activate/deactivate the appropriate controls
01133                 DampgroupBox->Visible=false; 
01134                 Relaxation1table->Visible=true;
01135                 Relaxation2table->Visible=false; 
01136                 R1R2groupBox->Visible=false;
01137                 RotationalgroupBox->Visible=false;
01138                 RelaxationgroupBox->Visible=true;
01139         }
01140         else if(FormalismcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Nottingham DNP theory") 
01141         {
01142                 //Set the Spinach parameter
01143                 relaxationtheorystring+="'nottingham'"+";\r\n";
01144 
01145                 //Activate/deactivate the appropriate controls
01146                 DampgroupBox->Visible=false; 
01147                 Relaxation1table->Visible=false;
01148                 Relaxation2table->Visible=false; 
01149                 R1R2groupBox->Visible=true;
01150                 RotationalgroupBox->Visible=false;
01151                 RelaxationgroupBox->Visible=true;
01152         }
01153         else if(FormalismcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Weizmann DNP theory") 
01154         {
01155                 //Set the Spinach parameter
01156                 relaxationtheorystring+="'weizmann'"+";\r\n";
01157 
01158                 //Activate/deactivate the appropriate controls
01159                 DampgroupBox->Visible=false; 
01160                 Relaxation1table->Visible=false;
01161                 Relaxation2table->Visible=false; 
01162                 R1R2groupBox->Visible=true;
01163                 RotationalgroupBox->Visible=false;
01164                 RelaxationgroupBox->Visible=true;
01165         }
01166 
01167         //When the relaxation group box activated
01168         if(RelaxationgroupBox->Visible)
01169         {
01170                 //Set the Spinach parameter for  Relaxation target
01171                 relaxationtheorystring+="inter.equilibrium=";
01172 
01173                 //Select the Relaxation target
01174                 if(RelaxationcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Infinite temperature state (zero density matrix)") relaxationtheorystring+="'zero'"+";\r\n";
01175                 else if(RelaxationcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Thermal equilibrium (Di Bari - Levitt formalism)") relaxationtheorystring+="'levitt'"+";\r\n";
01176                 else if(RelaxationcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Thermal equilibrium (Levante - Ernst formalism)") relaxationtheorystring+="'levante'"+";\r\n";
01177 
01178                 //Set the secondary terms, if "none" do not write anything
01179                 if(SecondaryTermscomboBox->SelectedItem=="Scalar relaxation of the second kind") 
01180                         relaxationtheorystring+="inter.rlx_extras={'SRSK'}"+";\r\n";
01181 
01182                 //Set the Spinach parameter for Matrix element Retention
01183                 relaxationtheorystring+="inter.rlx_keep=";
01184 
01185                 //Select the Matrix element Retention
01186                 if(MatrixRetentioncomboBox->SelectedItem=="Keep diagonal elements only") relaxationtheorystring+="'diagonal'"+";\r\n";
01187                 else if(MatrixRetentioncomboBox->SelectedItem=="Keep Redfield kite (diagonal and ZQ)") relaxationtheorystring+="'kite'"+";\r\n";
01188                 else if(MatrixRetentioncomboBox->SelectedItem=="Keep diagonal and secular elements") relaxationtheorystring+="'secular'"+";\r\n";
01189                 else if(MatrixRetentioncomboBox->SelectedItem=="Keep all elements (lab frame only)") relaxationtheorystring+="'full'"+";\r\n";
01190 
01191                 //Set the Spinach parameter for Dynamic frequency shifts
01192                 relaxationtheorystring+="inter.rlx_dfs=";
01193 
01194                 //Select the Dynamic frequency shifts
01195                 if(DynamicFreqcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Keep") relaxationtheorystring+="'keep'"+";\r\n";
01196                 else if(DynamicFreqcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Ignore") relaxationtheorystring+="'ignore'"+";\r\n";
01197         };
01198 
01199         //When Rotational diffusion model box activates
01200         if(RotationalgroupBox->Visible)
01201         {
01202                 //Select the rotational diffusion model and activate/deactivate the appropriate controls(Rotational correlation times)
01203                 if(RotationalCorrcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Isotropic") 
01204                 {Tau_c1textBox->Enabled=true;Tau_c2textBox->Enabled=false;Tau_c3textBox->Enabled=false;}
01205                 else if(RotationalCorrcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Axial")
01206                 {Tau_c1textBox->Enabled=true;Tau_c2textBox->Enabled=true;Tau_c3textBox->Enabled=false;}
01207                 else if(RotationalCorrcomboBox->SelectedItem=="Rhombic") 
01208                 {Tau_c1textBox->Enabled=true;Tau_c2textBox->Enabled=true;Tau_c3textBox->Enabled=true;};
01209         };
01210 
01211         //Refresh keypress all the textboxes of this  tab
01212         RelaxationtextBoxKeyPress(DampRatetext, gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13)); //"DampRatetex" for example
01213 
01214         //Update final string and preview
01215         WriteHeader();
01216         WriteFooter();
01217 }

01219 /**
01220 * @brief EventHandler for combo box of Formalism in Relaxation theory tab
01221 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01222 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01223 */
01224 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::RelaxationtextBoxKeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
01225 {
01226         //Clear the string
01227         relaxationtheorynumstring="";
01228 
01229         //If key pressed is not number, or . or backspace or e,E or enter do nothing
01230         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != 'e' && e->KeyChar != 'E' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
01231         {
01232                 e->Handled = true;
01233         }
01234         else
01235         {
01236                 //When enter is hitted
01237                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
01238                 {
01239                         double result;
01240 
01241                         //Try to parse double number
01242                         if(Double::TryParse(((TextBox^)sender)->Text, result))
01243                         {
01244                                 //Returned to original color of the textbox
01245                                 ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
01246 
01247                                 //Damping Rate, only for damp
01248                                 if(DampgroupBox->Visible) 
01249                                         relaxationtheorynumstring+="inter.damp_rate="+ DampRatetext->Text+ ";\r\n";
01250 
01251                                 // Principal ratational correlation times, only for Redfield
01252                                 if(RotationalgroupBox->Visible)
01253                                 {
01254                                         //if only the first time is enabled
01255                                         if(Tau_c1textBox->Enabled && !Tau_c2textBox->Enabled && !Tau_c3textBox->Enabled) 
01256                                                 relaxationtheorynumstring+="inter.tau_c= 1e-9*"+ Tau_c1textBox->Text+";\r\n";
01257                                         else //if first and second time are enabled 
01258                                                 if(Tau_c1textBox->Enabled && Tau_c2textBox->Enabled && !Tau_c3textBox->Enabled) 
01259                                                         relaxationtheorynumstring+="inter.tau_c= 1e-9*["+ Tau_c1textBox->Text+" "+
01260                                                         Tau_c2textBox->Text+ " ] ;\r\n";
01261                                                 else //if all are enabled
01262                                                         if(Tau_c1textBox->Enabled && Tau_c2textBox->Enabled && Tau_c3textBox->Enabled) 
01263                                                                 relaxationtheorynumstring+="inter.tau_c= 1e-9*["+ Tau_c1textBox->Text+" "+
01264                                                                 Tau_c2textBox->Text+" "+
01265                                                                 Tau_c3textBox->Text+ "];\r\n";
01266                                 };
01267 
01268                                 //R1R2 electron and nuclear are enabled
01269                                 if(R1R2groupBox->Visible) relaxationtheorynumstring+=
01270                                         "inter.r1e="+R1etextBox->Text+";\r\n"+"inter.r2e="+R2etextBox->Text+";\r\n"+
01271                                         "inter.r1n="+R1ntextBox->Text+";\r\n"+"inter.r2n="+R2ntextBox->Text+";\r\n";
01272 
01273                                 //Update final string and preview
01274                                 WriteHeader();
01275                                 WriteFooter();
01276                         }//In case is not a double number is written
01277                         else e->Handled = true;
01278                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
01279                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
01280         };
01281 }

01288 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::Relaxation_EditingControlShowing(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs^  e)

01354 /**
01355 * @brief EventHandler for when finishing editing the first or second column's cell in the 
01356 * in Relaxations Rates datagridview R1 and R2 in Relaxation theory tab
01357 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01358 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01359 */
01360 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::Relaxation_CellEndEdit(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^  e) 
01361 {
01362         int result;
01363         r1ratesstring="";
01364         r2ratesstring="";
01365 
01366         //For when there is no lines yet or of when the first and the second column's current cells
01367         //are not empty and when the current cell is the last one
01368         if(e->RowIndex==-1 || 
01369                 (((DataGridView ^)(sender))[0,e->RowIndex]->Value!=" " &&
01370                 ((DataGridView ^)(sender))[1,e->RowIndex]->Value!="0.00" &&
01371                 ((DataGridView ^)(sender))->Rows->Count<e->RowIndex+2))
01372         {
01373                 //Add a row
01374                 ((DataGridView ^)(sender))->Rows->Add();
01375 
01376                 //Create  a combo box with an empty item
01377                 DataGridViewComboBoxCell^ Relaxationcombobox=gcnew DataGridViewComboBoxCell();
01378                 Relaxationcombobox->Items->Add(" ");
01379 
01380                 //Loop over all atoms in order to add them in the combobox
01381                 for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys) 
01382                 {
01383                         //Add Atom IDs in the combobox
01384                         String^ ID=Convert::ToString(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->ID);
01385                         Relaxationcombobox->Items->Add(ID);
01386                 }
01387 
01388                 //Set the combobox to the first cell
01389                 ((DataGridView ^)(sender))[0,e->RowIndex+1]=Relaxationcombobox;
01390 
01391                 //Set the value of the first cell combobox empty and to the second zero
01392                 ((DataGridView ^)(sender))[0,e->RowIndex+1]->Value=" ";
01393                 ((DataGridView ^)(sender))[1,e->RowIndex+1]->Value="0.00";
01394         };
01395 
01396         //For R1 values only
01397         if(Relaxation1table->Visible)
01398         {
01399                 //Set Exchange rate matrix initial to zero
01400                 r1ratesstring="inter.r1_rates=zeros("+AtomCollection->Count+");\r\n";
01401 
01402                 //Loop over all datagridview R1 to write the data in the string
01403                 for(int i=0;i<RelaxationRate1data->Rows->Count;i++) 
01404                 {
01405                         //Check if the first column is a valid integer number and second different than zero
01406                         if( Int32::TryParse(((String ^)RelaxationRate1data[0,i]->Value), result) &&
01407                                 RelaxationRate1data[1,i]->Value!="0.00")
01408                                 r1ratesstring+="inter.r1_rates("+         //Write R1 values in appropriate format into the string
01409                                 (Convert::ToInt32(RelaxationRate1data[0,i]->Value))+ ")=" +  //one-base indexing
01410                                 RelaxationRate1data[1,i]->Value+";\r\n";
01411                 };
01412         };
01413 
01414         //Loop over all datagridview R2 to write the data in the string
01415         if(Relaxation2table->Visible)
01416         {
01417                 //Set Exchange rate matrix initial to zero
01418                 r2ratesstring="inter.r2_rates=zeros("+AtomCollection->Count+");\r\n";
01419 
01420                 //Loop over all datagridview R1 to write the data in the string
01421                 for(int i=0;i<RelaxationRate2data->Rows->Count;i++) 
01422                 {
01423                         //Check if the first column is a valid integer number and second different than zero
01424                         if( Int32::TryParse(((String ^)RelaxationRate2data[0,i]->Value), result) &&
01425                                 RelaxationRate2data[1,i]->Value!="0.00")
01426                                 r2ratesstring+="inter.r1_rates("+         //Write R1 values in appropriate format into the string
01427                                 (Convert::ToInt32(RelaxationRate2data[0,i]->Value))+ ")=" +  //one-base indexing
01428                                 RelaxationRate2data[1,i]->Value+";\r\n";
01429                 };
01430         };
01431 
01432         //Update  the final strings
01433         WriteHeader();
01434         WriteFooter();
01435 };

01443 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::Relaxation_CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e)

01464 /**
01465 * @brief EventHandler for when mouse enters in a  cell(for only one click for begin editing)  in the 
01466 * first column in Relaxations Rates datagridview R1 and R2 in Relaxation theory tab
01467 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01468 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01469 */
01470 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::RelaxationRatedata_CellMouseEnter(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellEventArgs^  e) 
01471 {
01472         //For cells in first column, in row larger than first, in cell that is not current
01473         //and when only one cell is selected. Set current cell the one below mouse(entered)
01474         if( e->ColumnIndex==0 && e->RowIndex>=0 && !((DataGridView ^)(sender))->IsCurrentCellInEditMode 
01475                 &&  ((DataGridView ^)(sender))->SelectedRows->Count<1 )
01476                 ((DataGridView ^)(sender))->CurrentCell =  ((DataGridView ^)(sender))[e->ColumnIndex,e->RowIndex];
01477 }

01485  /**
01486 * @brief EventHandler for when we move the mouse with mouse button down, hand effect.
01487 * Not perfect from times to times crash.
01488 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01489 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01490 */
01491 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::PreviewtextBox_MouseMove(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::MouseEventArgs^  e) 
01492  {
01493          //Only for left button
01494          if( e->Button == System::Windows::Forms::MouseButtons::Left)
01495          {
01496                  //for the X coordinate
01497                  int tempX=panel2->HorizontalScroll->Value+2*(InitialPoint->X-e->Location.X);
01498 
01499                  //The value of position should be inside the range of horizontal scroll
01500                  if(tempX>panel2->HorizontalScroll->Minimum && tempX<panel2->HorizontalScroll->Maximum)
01501                  {
01502                          //Set the value of the Horizontal scroll
01503                          panel2->HorizontalScroll->Value+=2*(InitialPoint->X-e->Location.X);
01504 
01505                          //Reset the initial point
01506                          InitialPoint->X=e->Location.X;
01507                  }
01508 
01509                  //for the Y coordinate
01510                  int tempY=panel2->VerticalScroll->Value+2*(InitialPoint->Y-e->Location.Y);
01511 
01512                  //The value of position should be inside the range of Vertical scroll
01513                  if(tempY>panel2->VerticalScroll->Minimum && tempY<panel2->VerticalScroll->Maximum)
01514                  {
01515                          //Set the value of the Vertical scroll
01516                          panel2->VerticalScroll->Value+=2*(InitialPoint->Y-e->Location.Y);
01517 
01518                          //Reset the initial point
01519                          InitialPoint->Y=e->Location.Y;
01520                  }
01521          }
01522  }
01523 
01524  /**
01525 * @brief EventHandler for when we press mouse button down to save initial position.
01526 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01527 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01528 */
01529 System::Void SpinachGUI::Spinach::PreviewtextBox_MouseDown(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::MouseEventArgs^  e) 
01530 {
01531         //Save initial position and then fire mouseMove
01532         InitialPoint=e->Location;
01533         PreviewtextBox_MouseMove(sender,e);
01534 }
